meta.name: RWE v0.4 config
meta.notes: All motif pools and seeds are configured here. Explanations are included as JSON fields so the file stays valid JSON.

initial_words.description: Initial seed motifs used to build the first prompts. They strongly influence early iterations and can bias the whole series because later motifs are learned from captions.
effects: Controls the early aesthetic direction of the series
If too generic, the series can drift toward common model priors
If too specific, the series can become repetitive

banned_motifs.description: Hard blacklist of motifs that should not enter the evolving motif bank. These words correlate with the 'hallway/interior trap' and bland geometry.
effects: Prevents the system from learning interior/hallway cues from captions
Reduces repeated corridors, rooms, walls, floors, furniture
Helps avoid monotone color cues like 'white/gray/black' dominating

stopwords.description: Words filtered out when extracting keywords from image captions. This removes grammar words and generic image words so only meaningful motifs remain. The system also unions this list with banned_motifs internally.
effects: Keeps the learned motif bank clean and specific
Avoids learning generic noise like 'photo', 'image', 'showing'
Improves motif diversity by focusing on content words

style_pool.description: A rotating list of style clauses appended to the prompt. Rotating style helps prevent local minima (same composition repeated) while keeping coherence.
effects: Adds controlled variation without changing core motifs
Can steer the model toward exteriors, macro, diagrammatic looks
If style rotation is too strong, coherence may drop
values: sunlit exterior, wide angle, deep depth of field, cinematic composition
foggy landscape, monumental scale, atmospheric perspective, cinematic composition
macro photography, extreme detail, shallow depth of field, studio lighting
isometric diagram, clean geometry, technical illustration, high detail
surreal natural history, specimen display, archival labels removed, high detail
biomechanical sculpture garden, dramatic lighting, high detail

novelty_motif_pool.description: Motifs used as 'novelty injections' when the series becomes too similar to the previous iteration (low novelty). These are inserted into the motif bank to force exploration.
effects: Breaks repetition loops
Introduces new semantic directions to explore
Too much injection can reduce coherence

escape_motifs.description: Motifs used when the system detects an 'interior trap' (captions repeatedly mention interior/hallway cues). Escape motifs push the scene outdoors and toward open compositions.
effects: Actively counteracts interior/hallway attractors
Shifts compositions toward open sky/landscape/ruins
Combines well with style rotation for fast recovery

genesis_image.description: Optionales Startbild (URL). Wird vor Iteration 1 geladen, analysiert und als Genesis in die Logdatei geschrieben.
effects: Erzeugt eine ausführliche Analyse (Caption, Keywords, Farben, Statistik)
Seedet die Motivbank mit erkannten Keywords
Dient als Referenz-Embedding für die erste Iteration

slideshow.description: Konfiguration für die Slideshow im Run-Ordner.
effects: Legt die automatische Umschaltzeit der Bilder fest
Wird vom start_slideshow.ps1 im Run-Ordner gelesen

runtime_defaults.description: Defaults used by the runner if you do not override interactively.
effects: Convenient defaults for repeatable runs
You can still override iterations and HF token interactively

image_sizes.description: Selectable image size presets for generation.
effects: Controls the generated image resolution (width/height).
Larger sizes need more VRAM and can be slower.
